messages.subject: Kahlil Gibran's verse on children
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/10/03 6:55:00 AM, seanachai3@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/10/03 6:55:00 AM, seanachai3@... writes:

<< I thought of this too when I read this paragraph -- but I didn't know it

had been set to music. It comes from Gibran's book "The Prophet". Very

cool. (it's actually longer than this - does the song have the entire

verse, or is this where it stops?) >>

I can't cut and paste from the page without glitching the e-mail, but here's
a link to it:

http://www.globusz.com/ebooks/Prophet/00000014.htm
